name: Coccinella
overview: Originally created for publication in Italy, this action game by Luigi Recanatese has you in charge of a ladybird\ladybug as she moves around the garden and was intended for release in 1986. In 2004 the game was updated and debugged (as much as you can a game about a ladybug) and Taper and Quorthon's fixes were made into an English version of the game, which was released as public domain.
